title: Four Seasons Resort Hualalai Named Among Top 100 Hotels in the WorldTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons Resort Hualalai figures among top 100 world hotels
Four Seasons Resort Hualalai at Historic Ka’upulehu was named on the list of Top 100 Hotels overall, in Travel + Leisure’s 2015 World’s Best Awards readers’ poll. A “Hall of Fame” entry of these awards, the Resort is Hawaii Island’s first and only AAA Five Diamond and Forbes Five-Star hotel.
“We’re thrilled thatTravel + Leisure readers have again recognised Hualalai as one of the world’s best resorts,” says Robert Whitfield, Regional Vice President and General Manager of Four Seasons Resort Hualalai. “We are continuing to elevate the experience here, with more personalisation, incredible experiences and enhancements on the way, including our newly added Suite Experience Manager program and Oceanfront Concierge service.”
The results are featured online now and in the August 2015 issue of Travel + Leisure.The Resort is currently offering the Experience More package, providing guests with a USD 1,000 resort credit that can be applied to incidental charges during their stay, including Spa, golf, retail and dining.
Source:-Four Seasons
